other_tests.findings: Iron-deficiency anemia with a hematocrit of 22%.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Hematocrit became dependent on adherence to iron supplementation, which when inconsistent, declined to as low as 28%.

other_tests.findings: Uterus measuring 14 cm with multiple fibroids, largest measuring 6.7 cm. Six months ago, uterus assessed at 11.9 cm with a fundal fibroid of 5.2 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial ultrasound showed an increased size of the fibroids and uterus compared to the most recent assessment.
Symptoms returned about a year later.
